com.github.codeteapot.maven.plugins.packer

Class AbstractPackerMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.github.codeteapot.maven.plugins.packer.AbstractPackerMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PackerBuildMojo

    public abstract class AbstractPackerMojo
extends AbstractMojo
    Abstraction for executing Packer commands through Maven plug-in.

      • mustBeExecuted

        protected abstract boolean mustBeExecuted()
                                   throws MojoExecutionException
        Determines if the plug-in must be actually executed.
        Returns:
        The flag value determining this plug-in must be actually executed.
        Throws:
        MojoExecutionException - When an execution error has been occurred.

      • executionGet

        protected abstract PackerExecution executionGet(Packer packer)
                                         throws MojoExecutionException,
                                                IOException
        Creates an execution instance from the given Packer tool with a suitable packer terminal.
        Parameters:
        packer - Packer tool instance with a suitable terminal.
        Returns:
        The execution that is created with the given Packer tool.
        Throws:
        MojoExecutionException - If some error has been occurred while trying to create the execution.
        IOException - If some I/O error has been occurred.

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws MojoExecutionException,
                    MojoFailureException
        Execute a command through a Packer tool instance with a suitable terminal.
        Throws:
        MojoExecutionException - When there is some execution error.
        MojoFailureException - When there is some failure while executing Packer command.
